name: COMMUNAL CAULDRON
description:
COMMUNAL CAULDRON: A worker is awakened in a camp with a cauldron. He must rebuild his community, but first he should think and explore.

CONTROLS:

LEFT CLICK - pick up stack of items/tile; places the stack of item/tile

RIGHT CLICK - pick up half a stack/place a single item (item size must match slot)

LEFT CLICK HOLD DOWN ON TILE - view recipes for the tile

LEFT CLICK HOLD ON ITEM IN A SLOT - tiles with that item as an ingredient are flagged on the top right, dark blue if all ingredients are discovered, light blue if missing some ingredients

Flags will also appear in the top left of a tile when you discover an item, with the same color scheme. 

If arrows appear over a tile, then it wants to expand, but it doesn't have enough space. Mouse over the arrows to see where the new tiles will be, and move the tiles until there is for it to expand.

The game automatically saves every 10 seconds to the default save. If you want to start over, hold down left shift, left control, and press P.

All assets are made for this game by Divagated (except for the font, which was made by Divagated, but not for this game)
